metadata.description: The Alpha pass gives you an airdrop from the NBA Sniper Gang NFT and White List access to more upcoming projects. Gives you access to the community where all call outs are being made. Gives you access to our 3k a month nansen.ai package that we pay monthly so you don't have to. Gives you access to a NFT course with 3 different strategies to help you snipe and make money. If you're lucky enough to catch a rare, you will get access to join a membership to learn about crypto, NFTs and the metaverse valued at $3500 for the mentorship.
metadata.name: Platinum Pass
